content:
Sure, here are the remaining equations related to our model:

Capital returns:

Rkf=∂Yf∂Kf=αAf1−αα(LfKf)β(1−α)αRkg=∂Yg∂Kg=βAg1−ββ(LgKg)(1−β)(1−α)βRkr=∂Yr∂Kr=Ar1α(LrKr)1−ααR\_k^f = \frac{\partial Y\_f}{\partial K\_f} = \alpha A\_f^\frac{1-\alpha}{\alpha} \left(\frac{L\_f}{K\_f}\right)^\frac{\beta(1-\alpha)}{\alpha} \\
R\_k^g = \frac{\partial Y\_g}{\partial K\_g} = \beta A\_g^\frac{1-\beta}{\beta} \left(\frac{L\_g}{K\_g}\right)^\frac{(1-\beta)(1-\alpha)}{\beta} \\
R\_k^r = \frac{\partial Y\_r}{\partial K\_r} = A\_r^\frac{1}{\alpha} \left(\frac{L\_r}{K\_r}\right)^\frac{1-\alpha}{\alpha} \\Rkf​=∂Kf​∂Yf​​=αAfα1−α​​(Kf​Lf​​)αβ(1−α)​Rkg​=∂Kg​∂Yg​​=βAgβ1−β​​(Kg​Lg​​)β(1−β)(1−α)​Rkr​=∂Kr​∂Yr​​=Arα1​​(Kr​Lr​​)α1−α​Overall capital demand:

K=Kf+Kg+KrK = K\_f + K\_g + K\_r \\K=Kf​+Kg​+Kr​Overall labor demand:

L=Lf+Lg+LrL = L\_f + L\_g + L\_r \\L=Lf​+Lg​+Lr​Overall energy demand:

E=Ef+EgE = E\_f + E\_g \\E=Ef​+Eg​Demand for goods outside the energy sector:

Qr=1πWrLrQ\_r = \frac{1}{\pi} W\_r L\_r \\Qr​=π1​Wr​Lr​Returns to investment in the different sectors:

Rf=πfKfRg=πgKgRr=πrKrR^f = \frac{\pi\_f}{K\_f} \\
R^g = \frac{\pi\_g}{K\_g} \\
R^r = \frac{\pi\_r}{K\_r} \\Rf=Kf​πf​​Rg=Kg​πg​​Rr=Kr​πr​​Demand for fossil fuel energy:

Ef=(11+exp⁡(−γf(Wf−Wˉf)))1ϵfEtE\_f = \left(\frac{1}{1+\exp(-\gamma\_f(W\_f - \bar{W}\_f))}\right)^\frac{1}{\epsilon\_f} E\_t \\Ef​=(1+exp(−γf​(Wf​−Wˉf​))1​)ϵf​1​Et​Demand for green energy:

Eg=(11+exp⁡(−γg(Wg−Wˉg)))1ϵgEtE\_g = \left(\frac{1}{1+\exp(-\gamma\_g(W\_g - \bar{W}\_g))}\right)^\frac{1}{\epsilon\_g} E\_t \\Eg​=(1+exp(−γg​(Wg​−Wˉg​))1​)ϵg​1​Et​Price of fossil fuel energy:

Pf=CfEfP\_f = \frac{C\_f}{E\_f} \\Pf​=Ef​Cf​​Price of green energy:

Pg=CgEgP\_g = \frac{C\_g}{E\_g} \\Pg​=Eg​Cg​​Total energy production:

Et=Ef+EgE\_t = E\_f + E\_g \\Et​=Ef​+Eg​Healthcare demand:

H=11+2αf(Ef/Et)+αg(Eg/Et)H0H = \frac{1}{1+2\alpha\_f(E\_f/E\_t) + \alpha\_g(E\_g/E\_t)} H\_0H=1+2αf​(Ef​/Et​)+αg​(Eg​/Et​)1​H0​I hope this helps!
